Meteara: Understood.

She reverts to her beast mode and follows the path out, going all the 
way through the glacial waters and out. She walks out of the sea and 
looks for Firaxis.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Hmm... my poor little Firaxis seems to have broken the 
mystical forth 
> wall... something shall have to be done to him... er... about him...
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        "Well... I'm not really sure what it is.  But it fell on us 
so it 
> seems like it might be worth checking out.  I've been a mercenary 
too long to 
> dismiss coincidences.  Too often they're annoying plot devices... 
er... 
> things that can be useful later."  He shakes his head and looks 
around seeing 
> things in a new light.  "Umm, I'm at the surface waiting for you, 
so just 
> come back up the way we went in and I'll lead you to the artifact.
